entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
